summary: An OTP retailer disputes an estimated assessment of tobacco products tax on unlicensed purchases of OTP. With its petition for review, the retailer provided additional records that it claims to be purchase invoices for all of its unlicensed OTP purchases and asks the Department to recalculate tax due based upon these records. We remand this matter to the operating division to determine whether Taxpayer is entitled to an adjustment based on the records it provided with its petition.
